response.overview: In the not so distant future, Theodore, a lonely writer, purchases a newly developed operating system designed to meet the user's every need. To Theodore's surprise, a romantic relationship develops between him and his operating system. This unconventional love story blends science fiction and romance in a sweet tale that explores the nature of love and the ways that technology isolates and connects us all.
response.title: Her

cast.name: Steve Zissis
cast.character: New Sweet Boyfriend of Mother Who Dated Pricks
